pr_title: Make RDS timeout configurable in the Titus relocation service

timeline.message:
Make RDS timeout configurable in the Titus relocation service

and increast the default from 30sec to 90sec

timeline.bodyText: if you timeout the Mono, does the underlying sql query also get cancelled or is the query just going to run until completion?
timeline.author: corindwyer

replies.bodyText: I think it will not be cancelled. This request is run synchronously on an internal executor.
replies.author: tbak
